alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 28 at 7:04PM MST until March 01 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ TO 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast New Mexico and southwest and western Texas. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ to 9 PM CST /8 PM MST/ Wednesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
